bibl.title: The Meaning and Function of Ioudaios in Graeco-Roman Inscriptions.
bibl.note: (i) The meaning of Ioudaios: (a) Ioudaios as a personal name; - (b) Ioudaios as a geographical indicator?; - (c) Ioudaios as an indicator of status within the Jewish community. - (ii) The function of Ioudaios. - (iii) The interpretation of Ioudaios on some stones whose original context is unknown. - Conclusion. - Appendix 1. - Appendix 2.
bibl.seg: WILLIAMS Margaret H., The Meaning and Function of Ioudaios in Graeco-Roman Inscriptions.

(i) The meaning of Ioudaios: (a) Ioudaios as a personal name; - (b) Ioudaios as a geographical indicator?; - (c) Ioudaios as an indicator of status within the Jewish community. - (ii) The function of Ioudaios. - (iii) The interpretation of Ioudaios on some stones whose original context is unknown. - Conclusion. - Appendix 1. - Appendix 2.
